alert.note: Alert for Kent; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 23 at 2:26AM EDT until April 23 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WINDHAM...NORTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON AND SOUTHWESTERN KENT COUNTIES... At 226 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Voluntown, or 10 miles east of Jewett City, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Coventry, Hopkinton, Exeter, West Greenwich and Sterling. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
